channel.title: Simple Question
channel.description:
Yo guys, i'm new to coding private servers etc. I've been playing with various sources etc and trying new things out.
And my problem is i have a new source but when i do the usual things like change compile etc, and then try and run the server it logs into an existing server.
The question basically is how do i make the client load my source on my pc.
I have searched through the forums and unfortunatly i couldnt find it.
Thanls

item.title: Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @QuakeTavlonia QuakeTavlonia
item.description:
@QuakeTavlonia wrote:

HyBriD PVP

I found that in the client.java file, and then changed it to my default gateway
Now to see if it works …

now it doesnt connect to a server at all

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Question
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

yeah its usually in client.java search for “server =” and “ip =”
if not then try gui.java

Read full topic
